bioghist.p: Samuel Avery was a tailor, probably in Connecticut.

scopecontent.p: This is an account ledger of Samuel Avery, 1773-1797. Entries are arranged by customer, listing clothing made, charges, and payments (payments are made in cash and in goods). Avery's customers included Jabez Huntington, Colonel Joseph Trumbull, and John Trumbull.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
